text: maṟaivāṉavaṟṟiṉ cāvikaḷ avaṉiṭamē irukkiṉṟaṉa. Avaṟ(ṟil uḷḷavaṟ)ṟai avaṉait tavira vēṟevarum aṟiyamāṭṭār. Nilattilum, nīrilum uḷḷavaṟṟaiyum avaṉ naṉkaṟivāṉ. Avaṉ aṟiyāmal ōr ilaiyum utiruvatillai. Pūmiyiṉ (āḻattil) aṭarnta iruḷil (putaintu) kiṭakkum (kaṭuku pōṉṟa ciṟiya) vittum, pacumaiyāṉatum, ularntatum avaṉuṭaiya teḷivāṉa (pativup) puttakattil illāmalillai
